# EvolutionBorg - Phase 2 (Mid Game)
# Generated by: Opus 4.5
# Levels 20-35, Dungeon Depth 30-60
# Focus: Power scaling and unique hunting

# Worships
borg_worships_damage = FALSE
borg_worships_speed = TRUE
borg_worships_hp = TRUE
borg_worships_mana = FALSE
borg_worships_ac = FALSE
borg_worships_gold = FALSE

# Behavior
borg_plays_risky = FALSE
borg_kills_uniques = TRUE
borg_uses_swaps = TRUE
borg_no_deeper = 60
borg_cheat_death = FALSE

# Transition to Phase 3 when:
# - Character level >= 35 (primary)
# - Has speed item +3 or better (secondary)
# - Killed 10+ uniques (fallback)
